description:
It's taken three seasons but The Vampire Diaries and The Originals are finally intersecting thanks to the vampire shows' oldest friendship - Stefan (Paul Wesley) and Klaus (Joseph Morgan).《吸血鬼日记》和《初代吸血鬼》要串剧了！距离Stefan和Klaus这对老朋友上次分别已经有整整3季了。

What is his reaction to seeing Klaus again for the first time in a while?这么久没见Klaus，当Stefan第一眼看到Klaus回来时是什么反应？

Wesley: "Holy s--t, we have so much history and so many experiences together, but we are so different now." He's also hiding a secret from Klaus when he first sees him, so it's not completely innocuous. [Stefan] is a little on edge because he's afraid that Klaus may figure out [that] secret. He kind of has to fool him into thinking he's there for a reason that he's not. That creates a little bit of awkwardness and unease in Stefan's mind, [but] I think he's relieved to see someone that was once his friend.Wesley：我勒个去，我们过去有太多共同回忆，不过现在我们已经不是以前的我们了。第一眼看到Klaus的时候，他有个秘密没有告诉他，这个秘密很重要，而他又怕Klaus发现这个秘密。这个秘密让Stefan有些尴尬，不过相信最终他将会坦然面对这位曾经的好友。

How is Klaus going to react to the fact that Caroline was pregnant and just had twins?知道Caroline现在怀上了双胞胎之后，Klaus会有什么反应？

Wesley: They discuss it, for sure. Klaus keeps his cool. Wesley：他们肯定会聊这个话题。Klaus表现得很酷。

The Vampire Diaries and The Originals crossover event kicks off Friday at 9/8c on The CW.《吸血鬼日记》和《初代吸血鬼》串剧将会在本周五开播。

description:
《英乐天天唱》是一档模仿唱歌类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语能力。主持人会在每期节目中选取好听的歌曲片段，并给出发音提示和模仿示例。喜欢听音乐的童鞋可要积极参与哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

一个来自加州洛杉矶的创作型歌手，在推出了几张单曲之后，Aimee终于发行了首张专辑——《A Little Happiness》，Pop rock曲风，清新的小调，直率的声音，小女生的声音清新，富有感染力。

讲解：

模唱：

I had a bad day, don't talk to me
I'm gonna ride this out
My little girl heart breaks apart
From your big mouth

And I'm sick, of my sickness
Don't touch me, you'll get this
I'm useless, lazy, perverted
And you hate me

But you can't save me
You can't change me
I'm waiting for my wake up call
And everything, everything's my fault

Went to the doctor, and I asked her
To make this stop
Got medication, a new addiction
Thanks a lot

I had a relapse, I'm bad at rehab
Ruins everything
So point your finger at the singer
She's in the pharmacy

想要得到主持人专业的点评和意见吗？快来节目现场一试身手吧>>

title: 英文歌曲天天唱：Save Me

description:
Picture this, it's 1965 and a group of friends are out on a walk heading through the fields of a remote and beautiful island near the southern coast of Sweden - Gotland. The friends are all agricultural experts and in an old farm building they discover a chest and inside is a find - the importance of which would have passed most of us by.

They found so many different lines of wheat seeds. This is a treasure, they said. It was so exciting.
The treasure was wheat but not just any wheat. The varieties or lines stored by an old eccentric farmer called Ragnar Peterson contained relics from a farming past and the means of recreating flavours that had been forgotten. 50 years after the find its value is only now being realised.

One of his things was that you could make a real good bread of these old forms. And I think Ragnar in his heaven he is smiling in this time because we have continued growing his old forms.

In this week's programme we'll be explaining why the contents of that chest are now considered to be so valuable and why around the world more and more people are convinced that wheat's forgotten past has a role to play in the future of our food and its flavours. This story will also take us into some unusual places, including a hidden chamber cut deep into an icy mountain towards the North Pole.

We have a huge huge collection, the largest collection in the world of wheat. It's a history of everything that wheat has encountered and everything that human beings have selected it for since the dawn of agriculture 12,000 years ago.

声明：音视频均来自互联网链接，仅供学习使用。本网站自身不存储、控制、修改被链接的内容。“沪江英语”高度重视知识产权保护。当如发现本网站发布的信息包含有侵犯其著作权的链接内容时，请联系我们，我们将依法采取措施移除相关内容或屏蔽相关链接。>>零基础直达流利生活口语班<<
